definitions.definition: Any moth whose caterpillar stage is a silkworm , especially Bombyx mori , the domestic silkmoth, but also others in the familes Bombycidae and Saturniidae (as well as the Siberian silkmoth in the Lasiocampidae ).

main_definition: Any moth whose caterpillar stage is a silkworm , especially Bombyx mori , the domestic silkmoth, but also others in the familes Bombycidae and Saturniidae (as well as the Siberian silkmoth in the Lasiocampidae ).
